_sText:
Map:	de_school_fight

Version: 2.0

Author:	SSK	aka. mutant beaver

Installation:
Simply copy the .bsp file to /counter-strike source/cstrike/maps


I hope you will enjoy the map and have fun



---------------------------------------------------------

Changelog: v.2.0

	- Added props to make the interior look nicer
	- Added more hiding places, making it harder to win and less likly to be killed over long distances
	- Added light sources
	- Changed the exit from the terrorists start room, so it now is wider
	- Added background sound (soundscape)
	- Gave BOTS a different movement
	- Added place names


Known Bugs:
(Will be fixed)

	- Level overview map doesn't work
	- For some reason, the window texture to the office next to the CT-Spawn is behaving strange

---------------------------------------------------------
